sentence: The Company MUST maintain a consolidated leverage ratio below 4.0x under its credit agreement.
Management MAY incur additional borrowings subject to lender consent unless the leverage ratio exceeds 4.25x.
The borrower MUST maintain an interest coverage ratio above 3.0x across all secured loans.
The borrower MAY incur secured debt subject to lender approval unless a default exists.
The company MUST maintain a minimum unrestricted cash balance of $100 million.
The company MAY borrow additional funds subject to covenant compliance unless the fixed charge coverage ratio falls below 1.5x.
The company MUST maintain prudent liquidity consistent with its investment grade rating.
The company MAY issue notes for strategic investments in accordance with board-approved policies.
The company MUST maintain strong cash flow generation to fund strategic investments.
The company MAY issue notes within authorized limits.
The company MUST maintain financial flexibility to pursue R&D investments.
The company MAY borrow under its revolving credit agreement subject to customary approvals.
The company MUST comply with its credit agreements, which are not restrictive.
